segments.text: Hey man , you wanna buy some weed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Weed ! You know ? Pot , Ganja , Mary Jane some chronic !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also have blow if you prefer to do a few lines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on man ! I even got dope and acid ! Try some !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really have all of these drugs ? Where do you get them from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got my connections ! Just tell me what you want and I ’ ll even give you one ounce for free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good ! Let ’ s see , I want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want you to put your hands behind your head ! You are under arrest !
segments.speaker: S2
